name: Nobody likes Ugly
description:
"Ugly want's to make friends, but nobody likes Ugly because he's ugly...

People run from Ugly because they think Ugly is a monster.

Ugly don't want to hurt people, but want's to help them.

Ugly help people avoid traps and get them to the exit."

You play as Ugly, who looks nothing like your everyday civilian. Ugly want's to scare and navigate the civilians into running towards the exit and avoid the traps lying around. 

(Click the fullscreen button at the right bottom side of the game window in order to  see the entire game window)

WASD - Move Ugly
